name: Thermite

biography.description: Thermite is an important backline support for an attacking team. As one of the only hard-breachers in the game, losing Thermite early in the round will hinder your team significantly.

gameplayTips: Watch out for counters like Bandit's batteries or Mute's jammers.
Work with teammates like Thatcher or Twitch to remove defender gadgets.
Use Exothermic Charges for bigger destruction ranges on walls, hatches, or floors.
